title: Bangladesh invites 13 nations, including India, to BNP govt swearing-in; who’s on the list
summary_full: Bangladesh's Nationalist Party (BNP), led by Tarique Rahman, is set to form a new government following a landslide victory in the 2026 general election. Leaders from 13 countries have been invited to the swearing-in ceremony, signaling the party's inclusive foreign policy. The BNP expressed gratitude for PM Modi's congratulatory message and looks forward to constructive engagement with India.
